Package com.dhemery.publishing

Publish and subscribe to publications.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Channel A channel through which publishers can publish publications to subscribers.
Distributor Distributes publications to subscribers.
Publisher Publishes publications.
Subscription Represents a single subscriber's subscription to a single type of publication.
 

Class Summary
MethodSubscription A subscription to be fulfilled by calling a method.
MethodSubscriptionChannel A channel through which subscribers receive publications via methods annotated by Subscribe.
NullPublisher A publisher that does nothing.
SubscriberInspector Discovers the subscription methods on an object.
SubscriptionMethodFilter Accepts subscription methods and rejects non-subscription methods.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Subscribe Marks a method as being a subscription method.
 

Package com.dhemery.publishing Description

Publish and subscribe to publications.
